MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Asahi Kokura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: What do you mean? No matter how I look at it, she's Lady Luna...

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Risona Okura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Please get a hold of yourself!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Asahi Kokura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Yeouch! Whai areya swuddenry pwinchiing mah chweeks weeth booth hancds, what!?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Risona Okura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Open your eyes and take a good look!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Asahi Kokura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Ah - she's not Lady Luna...

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Risona Okura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
It's true that her hair colour and the Filia Academy uniform she's
wearing is the same. But everything else is completely different.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Asahi Kokura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Wait a minute ... if that's not Lady Luna, then...

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Risona Okura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Yes, I was thinking the same thing. I think you two are in love with each other now.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Asahi Kokura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Yeah, I don't think this is the time to joke around.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Risona Okura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
I'm serious about it though...
Not good, but okay.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Asahi Kokura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Then who is that person really? 
 I wonder if they are from our same world if she's wearing the academy uniform.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Risona Okura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: What should we do, she's looking at us, should I talk to her?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Asahi Kokura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Yes, she might be someone who have been sent here just like us.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Queensway
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Are the two of you safe!?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Risona Okura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Queensway-san! Conductor-san's group too...
Sorry, we went off on our own.

Firstly I am relieved to finally see the two of you again.
You two don't seem to be particularly injured.
However, the 'person' similarly dressed beside you is...?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Asahi Kokura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Ah, um, I'm not sure myself,
but I was just about to speak to her--
Asahi Kokura tried to walk forwards and speak to her.
Suddenly, something gouged out of the ground beneath her feet.

The figure in a girl's academy uniform held out one hand
towards Asahi. A ball of light shot out from her hand and--

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Asahi Kokura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Ugh, UWAAH--!?
Said ball of light grazed over Asahi's head.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Risona Okura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: A-Are you alright!?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Asahi Kokura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Uh, yeah...
That was a... threat.
We don't know what's going on,
but she's clearly hostile towards us.
Queensway, counting on you!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Queensway
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Affirmative! Let's go!
Queensway slashed at the figure in a girl's academy uniform.
But the figure ducked and disappeared like mist.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Queensway
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: What's going on, was that...?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Yakutsk
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: it's still too dangerous for you to run out on your own!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Asahi Kokura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Ugh, I'm sorry...

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Risona Okura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Indeed, please put yourself in the shoes of your worried sis.
And to make matters worse,
you didn't even witness Luna-chomu.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Asahi Kokura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I'm really sorry...

Asahi hung her head in shame.
Wait, didn't Resona just said something concerning?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Yakutsk
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Hey, didn't you just say 'sis'?
Could it be that you two are sisters?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Asahi Kokura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Eh...? Um, yes, well, in a manner of speaking.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Yakutsk
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Hmmm... Now that you mention it, you two seem to have a similar vibe somehow.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Risona Okura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: We are not just sisters, by the way. Am I right?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Asahi Kokura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Eh, umm, well... I, guess so?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Asahi Kokura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: (We're not sisters to begin with, we're brother and sister.)

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Risona Okura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
The feeling I have for this person is not like, but love.
In other words, yes, it's a forbidden relationship.

Risona twisted Asahi's arm with her hands.
It sounds like a ridiculous thing to say,
but I find this a friendly and funny scene.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Yakutsk
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: It's good to care about your 'siblings', no matter what form it takes.

Yakutsk showed a mysterious understanding.
Perhaps she is thinking of her own sister, Bestyakh.

- Aside from that,
was the sighting in the city who attacked
Asahi and Risona in the tundra a mysterious enemy, after all...?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Yakutsk
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Hmm, it's hard to say.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Risona Okura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
It's still a mystery.
Why was she wearing a Filia Girl's Academy uniform?

Anyway, let's clear out of here.
We may have received new information.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Queensway
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Roger that, let's go back.

That night.
At a certain place in Flamarine--.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Minato Yanagase
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Pant, pant, Luna, yer OK!?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Luna Sakurakuji
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Pant... Pant... still, can...
The two girls were running out of breath.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Minato Yanagase
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Tahahah, yer out of breaaath.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Luna Sakurakouji
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: That's how you are... Tch, they're catching up.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Minato Yanagase
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Oh woah woah, what to do what to do!?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Luna Sakurakouji
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Running away is an option.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Minato Yanagase
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: But it's gone around us!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Luna Sakurakouji
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Tch, give me a break...
TEEY!!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Minato Yanagase
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Whoa whoa, what's goin' on!?
